original_text: And ye shall go out at the breaches, every cow at that which is before her; and ye shall cast them into the palace, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 너희가 성 무너진 데를 통하여 각기 앞으로 바로 나가서 하르몬에 던져지리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall go out at the breaches
every cow at that which is before her
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 암소는 그 앞에 있는 것으로 나아가리라

sentences.original_text: and ye shall cast them into palace
